thread.title: Mastodon's Brent Hinds: Creed Is My Guilty Pleasure [News]
thread.title_full: Mastodon's Brent Hinds: Creed Is My Guilty Pleasure [News]

title: Mastodon's Brent Hinds: Creed Is My Guilty Pleasure [News]
text:
Posted 12 hours ago 20 
Brent from Mastodon revealed Creed as his guilty pleasure, confessing he hosts "Creed parties" at his house. 
The guitarist told Epiphone (transcribed by UG) "Ohhhh, Creed [is my guilty pleasure]. I'll fuckin' rip my shirt off and it's like, 'WITH AHUURRMMS WIDE OPAAAAN.' 
"I have Creed parties, everyone has to come dressed as Scott Stapp. Fuck, it's a Creed party, what? You didn't get the invite? Well I fuckin' didn't invite you on Facebook." 
You can watch the whole thing below if you're up for a chuckle.
